description: A creamy and lightly zested dip.
keywords: Dip & spread,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Vegan,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Avocado & Broad Bean Dip with Breads Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large avocado, de-seeded and skin removed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pot of water to the boil and blanche the broad beans for 3 minutes and then drain.
Allow the beans to cool slightly and then add then to a foof processor with the rest of the ingredients.
Blend until smooth and serve with a selection of condiments or breads.
